commands.name: az iot ops asset dataset list
commands.syntax:
az iot ops asset dataset list --asset
                              --resource-group
examples: az iot ops asset dataset list -g myresourcegroup --asset myasset

commands.name: az iot ops asset dataset show
commands.summary: Show a dataset within an asset.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops asset dataset show --asset
                              --name
                              --resource-group
examples: az iot ops asset dataset show -g myresourcegroup --asset myasset -n default
